title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Douglas P Lobo
raw_text: Cover Art  The Variable Man    Douglas P. Lobo is a self-taught digital artist from Brazil who is passionate about creating through the mediums of drawing, painting, game design, filmmaking, and writing. His works are mainly generated through the lenses of otherworldly fantasy and science fiction genres, being mostly a channel to the combination of a range of cultural references.
text:
Cover Art
The Variable Man
Douglas P. Lobo is a self-taught digital artist from Brazil who is passionate about creating through the mediums of drawing, painting, game design, filmmaking, and writing. His works are mainly generated through the lenses of otherworldly fantasy and science fiction genres, being mostly a channel to the combination of a range of cultural references.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: The Variable Man by Douglas P. Lobo
